profileAlternative.name: Ryan Hollister
profileAlternative.headline: Director Of Manufacturing at The Haskell Company
profileAlternative.summary:
Project Management Professional, Certified Professional Constructor, LEED AP, Six Sigma Green Belt, FSMA Preventative Controls Qualified Individual (PCQI)

Director of Project Development for The Haskell Company; a leading global provider of architecture, engineering, construction, and consulting services.

Specific expertise in the delivery of projects requiring the integrated engineering, procurement, and construction of facility, process, and packaging systems.

positions.title: The Haskell Company
positions.description: Lead Haskell’s efforts in modular and prefabricated construction and direct the utilization of the Design, Manufacture, Construct (DMC) delivery model.

positions.title: Field Supervisor
positions.description:
Led pre-dive task planning, field set-up, and maintained communication with divers in support of underwater operations including salvage, equipment recovery, cutting, welding, video inspection and general ship husbandry.

Assisted Marine Surveyor in the field with vessel inspections, ultrasonic gauging, depth soundings and hydrographic surveys.

positions.title: Military
positions.description: Served Multiple Deployments on the USS Samuel B. Roberts (FFG-58) as a First-Line Leader, Rescue Swimmer, and VBSS Boarding Team Member.
